reviewText: Both of these men are so fun to watch.  We got together with our parents and watched this over the holiday break and laughed our head off!.  These guys were a great team and both especially Cuba Gooding are so talented!  Get it because it's great and a treat for adult audiences.
summary: Paul Hogan and Cuba Gooding make anything great to watch!
Title: Lightning Jack VHS

reviewText: I made four purchases around 9PM MST in Eastern Oregon.Where most stores were closed these guys were up and running in New York, and my purchase of the DVD Lightning Jack quickly went through. And I received it no later than three-days.The product was in perfect condition when received.This is my first time using amazon.com and I made four orders. DVDa2z was the quickest to respond and a low price I could not ignore. Thank you, this is another comedy for my young family to watch.
summary: Open when most stores are closed!
Title: Lightning Jack VHS

reviewText: Well, if you have not seen this movie then you are missing a Paul Hogan good one!  This movie is humorously funny and very enjoyable to whatch.  While it's no "Young Frankenstein" it is a good family movie for all, it has all the nifties that a good movie should.
Title: Lightning Jack VHS

reviewText: I like Paul Hogan movies.  They are uplifting with just the right amount of humor.  This one is especially good, especially the part where Cuba Gooding Jr. is asked to suck the snake bite out of Paul's rear.  The look on Cuba's face was priceless.
Title: Lightning Jack VHS

reviewText: Loved this movie. Paul Hogen gives as good a performance in this movie as he did in Crocodile Dundee. Well worth owning
Title: Lightning Jack VHS

reviewText: I was expecting nothing less than fantastic from Paul Hogan.  Crocodile Dundee 1 & 2, were great movies.  Wasn't as great as I expected.  Was good, but not great.

reviewText: I happened upon this movie by accident and it turned out to be so funny.  You've got to see it!

reviewText: Hogan directed this movie and did a good job with both directing and acting.  You can almost believe he is as fast with a gun as he claims in the movie.  Cuba Gooding plays a non speaking part but his antics bring laughter to the movie.
Title: Lightning Jack VHS

reviewText: Paul Hogan,and Cuba Gooding jnr. a fabulous duo, it is a movie well worth watching more than once,it is very entertaining,the type of movie where you don't want to leave your seat until it is over, buy it you will be pleased you did.i don't want to give the story away,it would be ruined then.it is a brilliant western mixed with loads of comedy and touching moments.
Title: Lightning Jack VHS

reviewText: Funny is as funny does and this is funny.For Cuba fans it's really great.

reviewText: It is absolutly great fun for the entire family. I would recommend this to every Paul Hogan and Cuba Downing Jr fan.
Title: Lightning Jack VHS

reviewText: Should have been called the 'Legendof Cactus Jack', but anyway...'Cro-codiel Dundee' goes west and robsbanks using Havana Gooding, Jr. (play-ing a deaf mute with a slade to writeon!) as foil or diversion. Well filmed,with good performances all around andbelievable if not taken too seriously.Well, at least it's better than SnowDogs!
Title: Lightning Jack VHS

reviewText: Not a special story by any means but the sets and shooting sites are amazing and very authentically done so I enjoyed that part as much as the simple buddy comedy it really is all about. Good fun to watch compared to some of the boring new stuff they put out now a days.
summary: Lightning Jack is the Old West spashed full of comedy
Title: Lightning Jack VHS

reviewText: Bought this for my son, but I also watched it.  Paul Hogan is a good comical actor in this movie.  Product was received new and shipping was quick.  I would use this seller again for ordering other movies.

reviewText: I love this movie. I have been looking for his movie for a while and I finally found it yaaaa.
Title: Lightning Jack VHS

reviewText: Good movie about an australian american outlaw [Hogan] named Jack who's gang gets shot up, and in need of help, accepts a black mute orphan to help him out. While Jack is trying to get a reputation in the U.S. as a mean  cold blooded killer, the mute orphan barely knows how to fire a gun and  ends up slowing them up, until Jack teaches him what being an outlaw is all  about. If you liked Crocodile Dundee, you'll really like Lightning Jack.
Title: Lightning Jack VHS

reviewText: it is a good movie to watch with the family if you are into westerns

reviewText: Lightning Jack could have been fun but degenerates into very base humor rapidly.  I did not enjoy it at all and do not recommend it.  If you cannot watch it with your wife, it is not worth publishing.  Thanks
